content: @Nick Cameron since https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/3192 has now entered the final comment period I think we're safe to start working on landing https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/91970 on nightly
just wanted to ping you incase you're waiting for the FCP to end before doing that and to see if you want any help with the PR
(I'm very eager to start making progress on this again)

I think the next step is to get initial review. The PR is not perfect (in particular the docs need examples) but I didn't want to spend too much time polishing before I got an 'ok' on the overall shape of things
Oh, is it in a good state for review? I've been ignoring it based on the Draft status.
Yeah, for initial review. Definitely not ready to land, but review on the overall design, naming, location of stuff, etc. would be very welcome.
